About Us

With over two decades (!) of experience in search and open source technologies, we are excited about the evolution into Artificial Intelligence (AI), Large Language Models (LLM), and Machine Learning (ML).

While technologies evolve, the amount of work that it takes to make an effective applications for your users tends to stay the same. The majority of works lies the quality of the data and the speed and dependability of the services.

We focus on helping government agencies build dependable systems. Buzzwords including, but not to limited business intelligence, data visualization, search applications, etc.
